title: (x) Puma shirts - various similar {gang}
content:
Hello,

could you tell me which font that is?

http://www.subsidesports.com/uk/images/product/xlarge/CzechHSSNo.15Patches0405z.jpg  
http://www.subsidesports.com/uk/images/product/xlarge/CzechHSSNo.7Patches0405c.jpg  
 [http://www.subsidesports.com/uk/images/product/xlarge/CzechHSSNo.9Patches0405c.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123003653/http:/www.subsidesports.com/uk/images/product/xlarge/CzechHSSNo.9Patches0405c.jpg)

Thanks in advance.
author: marcelb

comments.content:
only the bottom link works.

Are you asking for the player name or the button? The “fair play” button looks like Arial, at least the R does. And the bad kerning.

I’ll defer to Lex’s customized Futura Display for the player name.

Thank you for the help.

I am mean the numbers and player names.

The first two links work, you just have to copy the adress and paste it.

Isn’t there a closer one than Futura Display? :(

Cheers.
How about DaFont’s [MyPuma](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123003653/http:/www.dafont.com/en/search.php?nq=1&q=mypuma), based on and expanded to resemble the Puma logo?

[Morgan poster black](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123003653/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/feliciano/morgan-poster/morgan-ps-black/) may get you close as well.

- Lex

FYI, for a link to work it has to have a blank line after it. For some reason.

hhp
